title: Featured Projects
tagline: Portfolio of Passion, Precision, and Progress

my_works.title: TaskMaster Pro
my_works.description: An intuitive task management app designed to boost productivity by organizing your daily to-dos, deadlines, and priorities with smart notifications and progress tracking.

my_works.title: FitTrack Buddy
my_works.description: A comprehensive fitness companion app that tracks workouts, monitors health metrics, and provides personalized exercise plans to help you achieve your fitness goals.

my_works.title: TravelMate Explorer
my_works.description: An all-in-one travel planner that helps users discover destinations, create itineraries, manage bookings, and share travel experiences with a community of explorers.

my_works.title: ArtSpace Gallery
my_works.description: A digital portfolio platform for artists to showcase their work, connect with potential clients, and participate in virtual exhibitions with integrated e-commerce capabilities.

my_works.title: MindCalm
my_works.description: A mental wellness app featuring guided meditation, breathing exercises, and daily mindfulness challenges to reduce stress and improve emotional balance.

my_works.title: BudgetWise
my_works.description: A personal finance app that simplifies budgeting by categorizing expenses, setting savings goals, and generating insightful reports to improve your financial health.
